segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is so focused on that plate, it’s almost as if the world around her has faded away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, water streaming over the edge and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a sense of dread as I watch it happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm demeanor and the chaos unfolding is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the open window, I see the garden – it looks so peaceful out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet inside, there’s a moment of impending disaster, and she’s unaware of it.
segments.speaker: PAR
